title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.8 - Decision of commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.8 - Decision of commission

State Regulations

The determination and decision of the commission shall be
in writing and in form similar to that used for water supply applications. The
original shall be filed in the office of the commission and certified copies
forwarded to the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
